title: Above 21
clause_text: Above 21.0 m. height - it shall be as per Regulation No.(1) 6.1.1(iii), (vi) or Regulation No.6.2.3, as the case may be. Note 5 - Other provisions excluding above, shall be as per UDCPR.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Above 21.0 m. height - it shall be as per Regulation No.(1) 6.1.1(iii), (vi) or Regulation No.6.2.3, as the case may be.
